reviewText:
I had almost given up hope continuing to watch some modern anime for lack of, to put it frankly, a depth of heart and understanding.
 Until I stumbled across this little gem of a series.
 Now I can't get away from it. Yes, the costumes are a little cheesy and the action comes and goes, but what hooks you is character development. Seamless honesty, caring and hope shines through all these awesome characters so much so that an action junkie like me stayed glued to the screen and is eagerly awaiting another season.
LET'S BELIEVE HEROES!
